itemInfo.itemDesc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Fir Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fir Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Plywood Hardener
item.desc: A material used to strengthen Plywood through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained using Alchemy.

item.name: Calpheon Ferry Prow
item.desc:
A Calpheon prow that can be attached to a ferry. It allows the boat to sail faster when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
Weight Limit +100LT
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Calpheon Ferry Cargo Container
item.desc:
A Calpheon freight chest that can be attached to a ferry. It allows the boat to hold heavier cargo when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
Weight Limit +100LT
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).
